snippet.title: Color Hero : Destroyed DEFENOID - Official Movie Trailer (ENG)
snippet.description:
Breaking New Type of Bullet Hell Shooting Game!

If Can’t Avoid, Then Block Up! 
Bounce off the bullets and defeat the enemies!

Once upon a time, Difenoidian lived happily ever after on Difenoid planet.
All out of sudden, some evils came out from nowhere and attacked the 
Planet! 
Difenoidian s sorrowfully cried about their stolen colors and the planet!  

Difenoidians need your help to retrieve their planet back with the shield!
And more, them to fight back their own colors!

This is not such a cliché kind of game; don’t miss the game of 
Toss the Bullets from the enemies Back to Them!  

[Game Features]
- Brand new genre of game that has never showed up!
- Kick off the enemies by bouncing off the bullets against a volley of 
  bullets!
- More than 30 adorable characters of Difenoid people! 
- Simple control with one finger! 
- Various levels available for the beginner to the master!
